timeline.bodyText:
Specifically, for FDBInQueryTest.testInQueryIndexSortedDifferently, the old alternative plan was
Index(MySimpleRecord$str_value_indexed <,>) | num_value_3_indexed EQUALS 1 ∪[Field { 'str_value_indexed' None}, Field { 'rec_no' None}] Index(MySimpleRecord$str_value_indexed <,>) | num_value_3_indexed EQUALS 4 ∪[Field { 'str_value_indexed' None}, Field { 'rec_no' None}] Index(MySimpleRecord$str_value_indexed <,>) | num_value_3_indexed EQUALS 2

and the new one is
Index(MySimpleRecord$str_value_indexed <,>) | Or([num_value_3_indexed EQUALS 1, num_value_3_indexed EQUALS 4, num_value_3_indexed EQUALS 2])

but the winner still is
Index(MySimpleRecord$str_value_indexed <,>) | num_value_3_indexed IN [1, 4, 2]

Hence no change in that test.
